cofh.lib.item

Interface IMultiModeItem

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    DetonatorItem, FluidReservoirItem, PotionInfuserItem, PotionQuiverItem, RFCapacitorItem, RFDrillItem, RFMagnetItem, RFPumpItem, RFSawItem, WateringCanItem, XpCrystalItem

    public interface IMultiModeItem
    Implement this interface on Item classes which have multiple modes - what that means is completely up to you. This just provides a uniform way of dealing with them.

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Default Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      default boolean decrMode(net.minecraft.item.ItemStack stack)
      Decrement the current mode of an item.
      default int getMode(net.minecraft.item.ItemStack stack)
      Get the current mode of an item.
      default int getNumModes(net.minecraft.item.ItemStack stack)
      Returns the number of possible modes.
      default boolean incrMode(net.minecraft.item.ItemStack stack)
      Increment the current mode of an item.
      default void onModeChange(net.minecraft.entity.player.PlayerEntity player, net.minecraft.item.ItemStack stack)
      Callback method for reacting to a state change.
      default boolean setMode(net.minecraft.item.ItemStack stack, int mode)
      Attempt to set the empowered state of the item.

    • Method Detail

      • getMode

        default int getMode(net.minecraft.item.ItemStack stack)
        Get the current mode of an item.

      • setMode

        default boolean setMode(net.minecraft.item.ItemStack stack,
                        int mode)
        Attempt to set the empowered state of the item.
        Parameters:
        stack - ItemStack to set the mode on.
        mode - Desired mode.
        Returns:
        TRUE if the operation was successful, FALSE if it was not.

      • incrMode

        default boolean incrMode(net.minecraft.item.ItemStack stack)
        Increment the current mode of an item.

      • decrMode

        default boolean decrMode(net.minecraft.item.ItemStack stack)
        Decrement the current mode of an item.

      • getNumModes

        default int getNumModes(net.minecraft.item.ItemStack stack)
        Returns the number of possible modes.

      • onModeChange

        default void onModeChange(net.minecraft.entity.player.PlayerEntity player,
                          net.minecraft.item.ItemStack stack)
        Callback method for reacting to a state change. Useful in KeyBinding handlers.
        Parameters:
        player - Player holding the item, if applicable.
        stack - The item being held.
